definition: clothing, food, housing and transport (idiom); people's basic needs
to live/to dwell/to stay/to reside/to stop/(suffix indicating firmness, steadiness, or coming to a halt)

to walk/to go/to travel/a visit/temporary/makeshift/current/in circulation/to do/to perform/capable/competent/effective/all right/OK!/will do/behavior/conduct/Taiwan pr. [xing4] for the behavior-conduct sense
row/line/commercial firm/line of business/profession/to rank (first, second etc) among one's siblings (by age)/(in data tables) row/(Tw) column

sentences.english: Second, he pays little attentation to his cloth, food or other enjoyments but spend much money to buy law books.
sentences.chinese: 还有，他不注重衣食住行，而热衷于购买法律书籍。

sentences.english: Money can help food, cloth and house in need.
sentences.chinese: 金钱有助于解决所缺乏的衣食住行问题。

sentences.english: The gentleman had a valet to wait on him hand and foot.
sentences.chinese: 这位绅士有一个男仆照顾他的衣食住行。

sentences.english: As clothes, food, shelter and travel are the four elements for life; we can not live without one of them.
sentences.chinese: 衣食住行是人生的四件大事，一件都不能缺少。

sentences.english: You need to be mindful of food, clothing, accommodation and transport.
sentences.chinese: 你们一定要注意衣食住行啊。

sentences.english: Being four top factors of living, clothes, food, house and traffic are always paid attention to.
sentences.chinese: 衣食住行作为四大生活要素，经常受到关注。

sentences.english: Thank LONDON for this article about the basic necessities in U. S. A.
sentences.chinese: 感谢London这篇有关美国衣食住行方面的文章。

sentences.english: Money is simply a currency that allows you to eat, dress and live.
sentences.chinese: 金钱只是一种货币，让你支付衣食住行的费用而已。

definition: to eat, drink, shit, piss, and sleep/(fig.) the ordinary daily routine
to eat, drink and be merry (idiom)/to abandon oneself to a life of pleasure
to have three meals a day
to eat and drink/food and drink
to have enough food and warm clothes/adequately provided
lit. firewood, rice, oil, salt, soy, vinegar, and tea/fig. life's daily necessities
pinyin: chai2 mi3 you2 yan2 jiang4 cu4 cha2

definition: lit. firewood, rice, oil and salt/fig. life's daily necessities
